clarification: Private property includes the right to acquire, possess, inherit, and sell private property, including land. Limits on property rights may come from the state (which may legally limit rights or fail to enforce them); customary laws and practices; or religious or social norms. This question concerns the right to private property, not actual ownership of property. This question does not ask you to assess the relative rights of men and women. Thus, it is possible to assign the lowest possible score to a country even if men and women enjoy equal— and very minimal — property rights.
cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2clprptym, *_osp, *_ord
